surepy.data.drift_correction module¶

surepy.data.drift_correction.drift_correction(selection, *args)[source]¶

Transform coordinates to correct for slow drift.

Parameters:
  • selection (Selection) – specifying the localization data on which to perform the manipulation.
  • args – transformation parameters
Returns:

a new instance of Selection referring to the same Dataset as the input Selection.
Return type:

Selection
